A practical approach in exploit development for embedded devices

Abstract

Developing exploits for embedded devices could be a tricky task. You have a stripped down operating system running on a special hardware with limited debugging capabilities. We take a look at different emulation techniques that can help you during the process of getting fresh exploits.

https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/pulls?q=is%3Apr%20%22m-1-k-3%22

Talk

  • slides, recording

Michael Messner

http://www.s3cur1ty.de
